raideryumi.name: Raider Yumi
raideryumi.desc:
Res +2
Good for follow-up attacks (+3 eff. Spd). With weapon advantage, strips foe's armor.

spellbaneyumi.name: Spellbane Yumi
spellbaneyumi.desc:
Res +2
Def-4. Effective against tomes/scrolls. Weak against other weapons.

sidelongyumi.name: Sidelong Yumi
sidelongyumi.desc:
Res +2
Weak to follow-up attacks (-5 eff. Spd). Cannot make follow-up attacks.

mikotosyumi.name: Mikoto's Yumi
mikotosyumi.desc: Def-2. Restores HP every turn. Str/Skill-2 after use in combat (restores 1/turn).

setsunasyumi.name: Setsuna's Yumi
setsunasyumi.desc: On a hit, target suffers Skill/Def/Res-4 (each stat recovers 1/turn).

fire.name: Fire
fire.desc: Ddg+10. Can't inflict criticals or trigger offensive skills.

fimbulvetr.name: Fimbulvetr
fimbulvetr.desc: Makes follow-up attacks more difficult to perform (-3 effective Spd).

ragnarok.name: Ragnarok
ragnarok.desc: Ddg -5. After use in combat, wielder suffers Mag/Skill-2 (recovers 1/turn).

ginnungagap.name: Ginnungagap
ginnungagap.desc: After use in combat, halves Mag until wielder attacks again.

lightning.name: Lightning
lightning.desc: Strikes twice when attacking. After use in combat, Mag/Skill-2 (recovers 1/turn).

mjolnir.name: Mjölnir
mjolnir.desc: Deals extra damage on critical hits.

nosferatu.name: Nosferatu
nosferatu.desc: Dark mages only. Absorbs target's HP. Can't crit, trigger off. skills, or follow up.

excalibur.name: Excalibur
excalibur.desc: Def/Res-5. Eff. vs. fliers. Good for but also weak to follow-ups (+5/-5 eff. Spd).

brynhildr.name: Brynhildr
brynhildr.desc: Leo only. May halve damage from magical attacks. Trigger % = (Skill stat)

ember.name: Ember
ember.desc: Ddg+10. A cantrip learned by beginning mages.

missiletainn.name: Missiletainn
missiletainn.desc: Ophelia only. Skill/Res+1. Not a sword.

disrobinggale.name: Disrobing Gale
disrobinggale.desc: Good for follow-up attacks (+3 eff. Spd). With weapon advantage, strips foe's armor.

speedthunder.name: Speed Thunder
speedthunder.desc: Enemies within two spaces receive Spd+4 after use in combat.

moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.desc: Restores 20% of wielder's maximum HP after combat he or she initiated.

iagostome.name: Iago's Tome
iagostome.desc: Wielder suffers Mag/Skill-2 after use in combat. Target suffers Def/Res-4 on hit.

odinsgrimoire.name: Odin's Grimoire
odinsgrimoire.desc: Ddg-20. Deals extra damage on critical hit. Cannot make follow-up attacks.

ratspirit.name: Rat Spirit
ratspirit.desc: Skill+1, Ddg+10. Can't inflict criticals or trigger offensive skills.

oxspirit.name: Ox Spirit
oxspirit.desc: Def+1. Each scroll weapon boosts one or more of the wielder's stats.

tigerspirit.name: Tiger Spirit
tigerspirit.desc: Spd+1. Makes follow-up attacks more difficult to perform (-3 effective Spd).

rabbitspirit.name: Rabbit Spirit
rabbitspirit.desc: Res+1, Ddg-5. After use in combat, Mag/Skill-2 (recovers 1/turn).

dragonspirit.name: Dragon Spirit
dragonspirit.desc: Skill/Def+1. Eff. vs. dragons. After use in combat, halves Mag until wielder attacks.

calamitygate.name: Calamity Gate
calamitygate.desc: Spd/Def+1. Inverts weapon advantage and doubles its effects.

snakespirit.name: Snake Spirit
snakespirit.desc: Spd/Res+1. Strikes twice when attacking. Afterward, halves Mag until unit attacks.

sheepspirit.name: Sheep Spirit
sheepspirit.desc: Def/Res+1. Use while equipped to restore 10 HP to the wielder.

paper.name: Paper
paper.desc: Spd+1, Ddg+10. Supposedly beats rock, but not much else.

malevolenttext.name: Malevolent Text
malevolenttext.desc: Skill+1. Makes follow-up attacks more difficult to perform (-3 effective Spd).

monkeyspirit.name: Monkey Spirit
monkeyspirit.desc: Skill/Spd+1, Res+2, Lck -4. A star-crossed spirit.

inkpainting.name: Ink Painting
inkpainting.desc: Skill/Lck+1. Mt X2 on counterattack. Mag/ Skill-2 after combat. Cannot follow up.

izanasscroll.name: Izana's Scroll
izanasscroll.desc: Skill+1, Def-2, Res-1. Doubles Mt when attacking. Cannot make follow-up attacks.

heal.name: Heal
heal.desc: Restores some HP to an adjacent ally. (HP restored = [10 + (Mag / 3)])

mend.name: Mend
mend.desc: Restores a lot of HP to an adjacent ally. (HP restored = [20 + (Mag / 3)])

physic.name: Physic
physic.desc: Restores some HP to a distant ally. (HP restored = [7 + (Mag / 3)])

recover.name: Recover
recover.desc: Restores a huge amount of HP to an adjacent ally. (HP restored = [35 + (Mag / 3)])

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.desc: Restores some HP to all allies in range. (HP restored = [7 + (Mag / 3)])

freeze.name: Freeze
freeze.desc: Reduces enemy Mov to 0 and Avo by 20 for one turn.

enfeeble.name: Enfeeble
enfeeble.desc: Inflicts -4 to all target's stats (each stat recovers 1/turn).

entrap.name: Entrap
entrap.desc: Warps an enemy to an adjacent space.

entrapenemy.name: Entrap (Enemy)
entrapenemy.desc: Warps an enemy to an adjacent space.

bifrost.name: Bifröst
bifrost.desc: Revives the most recently fallen ally in the current battle.

candycane.name: Candy Cane
candycane.desc: Restores 10-13 HP to an ally and 5 HP to the user. (HP restored = [10 + (Mag / 3)])

mushroomstaff.name: Mushroom Staff
mushroomstaff.desc: Restores 15-18 HP to an ally and grants the user Res+2 until end of battle. (HP restored = [15 + (Mag / 3)])

bouquetstaff.name: Bouquet Staff
bouquetstaff.desc: Restores 20-23 HP to an adjacent ally and grants target Lck+4 until end of battle. (HP restored = [20 + (Mag / 3)])

elisesstaff.name: Elise's Staff
elisesstaff.desc: Restores 10-13 HP to an ally in range. (HP restored = [10 + (Mag / 3)])

lilithsstaff.name: Lilith's Staff
lilithsstaff.desc: Restores 7-10 HP to all nearby allies. (HP restored = [7 + (Mag / 3)])

bloomfestal.name: Bloom Festal
bloomfestal.desc: Restores some HP to a nearby ally. (HP restored = [7 + (Mag / 3)])

sunfestal.name: Sun Festal
sunfestal.desc: Restores a lot of HP to a nearby ally. (HP restored = [14 + (Mag / 3)])

wanefestal.name: Wane Festal
wanefestal.desc: Restores some HP to a distant ally. (HP restored = [2 + (Mag / 3)])

moonfestal.name: Moon Festal
moonfestal.desc: Restores a huge amount of HP to a nearby ally. (HP restored = [25 + (Mag / 3)])

greatfestal.name: Great Festal
greatfestal.desc: Restores some HP to all allies in range. (HP restored = [2 + (Mag / 3)])

rescue.name: Rescue
rescue.desc: Moves a distant ally to an adjacent space.

silence.name: Silence
silence.desc: Renders target unable to use magic or staves for one turn.

hexingrod.name: Hexing Rod
hexingrod.desc: Reduces target's maximum HP by half for one battle.

lantern.name: Lantern
lantern.desc: Restores 7-10 HP to an ally in range. (HP restored = [7 + (Mag / 3)])

dumplingrod.name: Dumpling Rod
dumplingrod.desc: Restores 10-13 HP to a nearby ally or use to restore 10 HP to the wielder. (HP restored = [10 + (Mag / 3)])

bamboobranch.name: Bamboo Branch
bamboobranch.desc: Restores 15-18 HP to a nearby ally and grants Lck+8 to all allies within two tiles. (HP restored = [15 + (Mag / 3)])

sakurasrod.name: Sakura's Rod
sakurasrod.desc: Restores 7-10 HP to a nearby ally. (HP restored = [7 + (Mag / 3)])

purificationrod.name: Purification Rod
purificationrod.desc: Restores 30-33 HP to a nearby ally. (HP restored = [30 + (Mag / 3)])

dragonstone.name: Dragonstone
dragonstone.desc: Skill-3, Spd-2, Def+4, Res+3, Ddg+10. Magical. Cannot make follow-up attacks.

dragonstone+.name: Dragonstone+
dragonstone+.desc: Skill-5, Spd-4, Def+9, Res+7, Ddg+10. Magical. Mag/Skill-2 after use in combat.

beaststone.name: Beaststone
beaststone.desc: Skill+5, Spd+3, Def-2, Ddg+10. Enables a wolfskin or kitsune to fight as a beast.

beastrune.name: Beastrune
beastrune.desc: Skill-2, Spd-1, Def+4, Res+5, Ddg+10. Enables a tougher beast form.

beaststone+.name: Beaststone+
beaststone+.desc: Skill+8, Spd+6, Def-5, Res-3, Ddg+10. Str/Skill-2 after use in combat.

draconicrage.name: Draconic Rage
draconicrage.desc: Ddg+10. Cannot make follow-up attacks. The savage fury of a bestial dragon.

darkbreath.name: Dark Breath
darkbreath.desc: Ddg+10. Cannot make follow-up attacks. The foul exhalations of the darkest dragon.

dragonbreath.name: Dragon Breath
dragonbreath.desc: Ddg+10. Cannot make follow-up attacks. The fell breath of a First Dragon.

shackledfist.name: Shackled Fist
shackledfist.desc: The only weapon the Faceless need.

gauntlet.name: Gauntlet
gauntlet.desc: Ddg-5. Str/Skill-2 after use in combat. Dangerous on the wrong hands.

rock.name: Rock
rock.desc: Stoneborn only. A weapon deadly in its simplicity.

massiverock.name: Massive Rock
massiverock.desc: Stoneborn only. A weapon devastating in its simplicity.

astralbreath.name: Astral Breath
astralbreath.desc: Cannot make follow-up attacks. Deadly to those who live in just one world.

astralblessing.name: Astral Blessing
astralblessing.desc: Restores HP to a distant ally. (HP restored = [7 + (Mag / 3)])

hptonic.name: HP Tonic
hptonic.desc: Grants +5 to max HP for one battle.

azurassalve.name: Azura's Salve
azurassalve.desc: Restores 10 HP to all adjacent allies.

asugisconfect.name: Asugi's Confect
asugisconfect.desc: Restores 10 HP and grants +2 to Str/Skill/Spd for one battle.

rainbowtonic.name: Rainbow Tonic
rainbowtonic.desc: Grants Lck+4 and +2 to all other stats for one battle.

seedoftrust.name: Seed of Trust
seedoftrust.desc: Builds support between two paired units (when possible).

allegroharp.name: Allegro Harp
allegroharp.desc: Grants Spd+4 to allies within a two-square radius for one turn.

shellhorn.name: Shell Horn
shellhorn.desc: Grants Def+4 to allies within a two-square radius for one turn.

saw.name: Saw
saw.desc: Saws lower enemy stats on a hit.

bigsaw.name: Big Saw
bigsaw.desc: Ddg-5. Lowers enemy stats on a hit, but Str/Skill-2 after use in combat.

armsscroll.name: Arms Scroll
armsscroll.desc: Raises the weapon level of all equippable weapons and staves.

masterseal.name: Master Seal
masterseal.desc: Promotes a base class at LV 10 or higher to an advanced class.

heartseal.name: Heart Seal
heartseal.desc: Changes a unit's class based on personality (level stays the same).

partnerseal.name: Partner Seal
partnerseal.desc: Changes a unit's class based on S rank support partner (level stays the same).

friendshipseal.name: Friendship Seal
friendshipseal.desc: Changes a unit's class based on A+ support partner (level stays the same).

eternalseal.name: Eternal Seal
eternalseal.desc: Raises the level cap by +5 for a max-level unit (advanced/special classes only).

dreadscroll.name: Dread Scroll
dreadscroll.desc: Changes a unit to the Dread Fighter class.

ebonwing.name: Ebon Wing
ebonwing.desc: Changes a unit to the Dark Falcon class.

battleseal.name: Battle Seal
battleseal.desc: +2 to Str/Mag/Skill/Spd when carried. Bestowed only on the greatest tacticians.

visitationseal.name: Visitation Seal
visitationseal.desc: +2 to Lck/Def/Res when carried. Honor bestowed on the finest castle architects.

offspringseal.name: Offspring Seal
offspringseal.desc: Enables a unit to start an advanced class at a higher level than normal.

sightinglens.name: Sighting Lens
sightinglens.desc: Changes a unit to the Ballistician class (male units only).

witchsmark.name: Witch's Mark
witchsmark.desc: Changes a unit to the Witch class (female units only).

masteremblem.name: Master Emblem
masteremblem.desc: Grants +1 to all stats when carried.

falchion.name: Falchion
falchion.desc: Ddg+10. Effective vs. dragons. When equipped, use to restore 10 HP.

ragnell.name: Ragnell
ragnell.desc: Def+3. Makes follow-up attacks more difficult (-3 effective Spd).

parallelfalchion.name: Parallel Falchion
parallelfalchion.desc: Effective vs. dragons. Good for follow-ups (+3 eff. Spd). Restores HP when used.

thoron.name: Thoron
thoron.desc: Res+3, Ddg+5. A mighty tome named for a legendary thunder spirit.

marthsspatha.name: Marth's Spatha
marthsspatha.desc: Ddg+10. A good training weapon for future hero-kings.

ikesbackup.name: Ike's Backup
ikesbackup.desc: Def+3. Makes follow-up attacks more difficult (-3 effective Spd).

lucinasestoc.name: Lucina's Estoc
lucinasestoc.desc: Good for follow-up attacks (+3 effective Spd).

robinsprimer.name: Robin's Primer
robinsprimer.desc: Res+3. A practice grimoire to keep the apprentice safe.
